title: The Hopi Maiden
marks:
Title, Date and Inscription

ULC, printed in bro in lower margin, printed in brown: [THE HOPI MAIDE
description: sketchy style; young woman in profile from PL, with her hair in a bun over her PL ear; woman wears a hoop earring with ball at bottom; woman\'s shadow in profile behind face
creditline: Gift of Beverly and John Rollwagen
